---
title: "eulermat"
---


```
R = eulermat(a) -> Matrix{Float64}
```

Compute the Euler rotation matrix that rotates by angles `a` (in degrees) about the x, y and z axes.


## Methods

```julia
# 2 methods for generic function "eulermat" from GMT:
 [1] eulermat(; rx, ry, rz)
 [2] eulermat(a)
```
